name: The Victorian Novel to 1860
description: A study of major works of Victorian fiction, 1830-1860. This course focuses on the development of the realist novel in its social context. Authors studied might include Charles Dickens, William Makepeace Thackeray, the Bronte sisters, Anthony Trollope and Elizabeth Gaskell.Pre-1900 course
prerequisites: ENGB03H3 and ENGB04H3 and [one of ENGB05H3 or (ENGB01H3)]
